text: Arshak Jamalyan sometimes Arshag Djamalian ( 1882 in Ganja - 1940 in Paris) was an Armenian politician. He was a prominent Dashnak member who took part in the Armenian-Tatar conflicts. Jamalian was also the Minister of Communications to Tiflis. who served as Minister of Communication of the First Republic of Armenia in 1920. ==References== ==External links== *Arshak Djamalian - Biography Category:1882 births Category:1940 deaths Category:Politicians from Ganja, Azerbaijan Category:People of the First Republic of Armenia Category:Armenian Revolutionary Federation politicians
title: Arshak Jamalyan
